channel.title: cat-MŌ TE MĀRENA on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-MŌ TE MĀRENA on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer bpn10222 in Māori
item.description: *“Ko te mārena Bahá’i he kotahitanga me te whakaipo mahana o waenga o te tokorua. Heoti noa me āta mahi, me mārama pai rāua ki ō rāua ake tūāhuatanga. Ko te hononga mutungakore me here ki te kawenata mauroa, ko tāna he poipoi i te āhuru o te whakahoatanga me te kotahitanga kia taea ai te oranga mutungakore.” *—‘Abdu’l-Bahá *Ko te oati o te mārena, inā, ko ngā whiti hei whakapuakī mā ngā hoa mārena ki mua i te aroaro o ētehi kaiwhakaatu e rua neke atu kua whakaaetia e Te Huinga Wairua, ko ērā, kei te Kitáb-i-Aqdas (Te Pukapuka Tapu Rawa):
